Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0670 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-0670 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-1, affected by CVE-2022-0670
